name: Singapore Airlines' BRILLIANT A350 Business Class: Copenhagen to Rome
description:
Welcome to this incredible trip! YES, Singapore Airlines really are running a fifth freedom flight from Copenhagen to Rome and it is surely the best business class product you can take wholly within the EU. Enjoy!

0:00 Introduction
0:33 Check in and SAS Gold Lounge
2:26 Tricky logistics of this fifth freedom flight!
7:26 Boarding via the stairs!
9:10 Taxi and Takeoff
11:42 Business Class seat tour
12:18 Meal service
13:22 Obligatory toilet tour!
14:26 Amazing views over the Alps
14:44 WiFi
15:48 Amenity kit
16:38 Descent and Landing
17:18 Conclusions, fare details, outro and thanks

Date of Travel: 21 SEP 2021
Airline: Singapore Airlines
Livery: Standard Singapore Airlines livery
Route: CPH-FCO
Aircraft: Airbus A350-900
Flight Number: SQ 352
Miles: 954
Airborne time: 2h00m
